mapper.insert: insert into posting (posting_sn, admin_sn, img_sn, title, start_datetime, end_datetime, created_datetime, updated_datetime, delete_yn, detail, qualification) values (#{postingSn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminSn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imgSn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteYn,jdbcType=BIT}, #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{qualification,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update posting set admin_sn = #{adminSn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, img_sn = #{imgSn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_datetime = #{startDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_datetime = #{endDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_datetime = #{createdDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_datetime = #{updatedDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_yn = #{deleteYn,jdbcType=BIT}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, qualification = #{qualification,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where posting_sn = #{postingSn,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select posting_sn, admin_sn, img_sn, title, start_datetime, end_datetime, created_datetime, updated_datetime, delete_yn, detail, qualification from posting where posting_sn = #{postingSn,jdbcType=INTEGER}
